    • Constructor Detail

      • Animal

        public Animal(int paneWidth,
              int paneHeight,
              boolean white)
        Initializes Animal instance. Sets it's coordinates to random int value
        Parameters:
        paneWidth - width of Scene
        paneHeight - height of Scene
        white - tells if animal instance is white or black (good or bad)

    • Method Detail

      • isWhite

        public boolean isWhite()
        Checks if animal is white or not.
        Returns:
        true if animal is white

      • setWhite

        public void setWhite()
        Changes Animal color to white.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns x coordinate of an animal.
        Returns:

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns y coordinate of an animal.
        Returns:
        y coordinate

      • getRadius

        public int getRadius()
        Returns radius of sheep. Images of Animals in Pane are in circle shape. So I consider them as circles. Their width and height is the same. Radius is distance from the middle of image to the side parallel with x or y axe.
        Returns:
        radius

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates Animal position. In probability 1:20 Animal moves randomly Moves animal to the left/right/left/down so that animal doesn't go behind the Playground borders.

      • collision

        public boolean collision(Animal animal)
        Takes another instance of animal and returns boolean value which represents whether they met. Distance of the Image's middles is smaller than radius *2
        Parameters:
        animal - another instance of Animal
        Returns:
        true if animal met
